content.detailedDescription:
Hi guys, me and my wife have witnessed what we would call a ufo sighting over london tonight, just thought you would be interested.

it happened between 10.30pm and 11pm, there were loads of them (maybe about a hundred in total or more) coming from south west flying over london and disappearing to the north east for about 20-30mn in total.

they looked like orange lights flying fast and high, we thought it could be balloons but there wasn't a strong wind tonight to explain their speed and directions: they seemed to go high first on the south west, some looking like dancing with each other, and then crossing straight over london to the north east.

we caught it on camcorder and have still to process it, let us know if you would be interested in seeing the video.

i suppose we will know more about this tomorrow, as we are probably not the only ones to have witnessed that.

best regards,

*(names deleted -- sgonzalez/cms).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange lights flying over london.

content.detailedDescription: A large white object entered the atmosphere very fast and exploded in the air over the santa cruz mountains, just west of loma prieta. there was no big sound, just a muffled pop. when it exploded concentric rings came from the center in a plane. they were all colors of the rainbow, and i could feel them pass through me because i was at the same elevation as the event. it felt like vibrations, or if wind could pass through you. roughly 3000ft. i was looking out the window over a scene of the whole mountains south of the highway 17 over pass and monterey bay, and it was broad daylight. the news reported it as a meteor. i believe it was a ufo crash. there were no visible debris. and it came in realllly fast!
content.summary: Explosion over santa cruz mountains.

content.detailedDescription:
I awoke early, about 4am, looked out a north facing window of my home, and observed a very bright, strobing, light.  from point of observation, object was about 5 degrees in elevation at a heading of about 345 to 355 in azimuth, relative to north. range was estimated to be about 2 to 2.5 miles from point of observation.  observation was made at ground level (sea level), approximately 400 feet from tampa bay (this object was in weedon island state preserve).  shape of object could not be determined due to the object strobing white, then changing color to orange, then red, then back to white, and then repeating this color shift.  object has been observed now for about 45 minutes and the st petersburg fl police has been notified of the sighting. size of of object could not be accurately determined due to low light conditions (night time), however, it is estimated to be approximately 100-200 feet in diameter.  object drifts slowly in a primarily north-south motion (relative to itself (north-south not true north-south)), and moves (drifts) no more than one hundred feet if an imaginary central datum point was set.  drifting could also be described as being random in pattern when the object varies from the north-south plane of motion.  object also emits smaller strobing objects primarily of orange and red color, and has these objects strobe out from the main body no more than a distance of 100 feet (staying relatively close).  these smaller strobes are illuminated for less than 2 seconds from the time of it being strobed from the main body. after this time these smaller strobing bodies extinguish and do not re-illuminate.
end of report.  

in response to your numbered questions:
1-just awoke and as a practice look outside for anything abnormal.
2-bright flashing light
3-first a plane, but not in flight path, and, no sound.
4-described as requested in main paragraph above.
5-feeling was normal; nothing odd.
6-object extinguished.
content.summary: Semi stationary, strobing, color changing light; very bright

content.detailedDescription:
Early afternoon at lambert field/st. louis -- military jets taking off.  not unusual at lambert field - east to west.  however, the noise from jets became so frequent and intense . . . it sounded as if they were circling the area.   we (my mother and i) thought a jet was in trouble.  i then saw an object, similar to a jet, flying from south to north.  very low, clear and distinct.  (i was facing east toward lambert field - which is approximately 1/4 mile away)

the "jet" did not appear to have wings - - i can only describe it as "jet like".   so strange in appearance, it stunned me.  (oddly enough, we were on screened porch/watching birds - with binoclulars handy).  by the time i thought to grab binoclulars it was gone.

i cannot even begin to describe this thing.  a jet without wings...An extended section between "cockpit" and "tail" like a helicopter.  i was just stunned.  soon after this craft passed, activity/noise from military jets ceased.  

living close to lambert, we have seen all kinds of aircraft and we are used to the noise (commercial, military, etc)  i can only say i was stunned by the appearance of this craft.  (the unusual noise, the flight path, the appearance of the object)

unlike most ufo reports that claim no noise was heard from the craft - - in this case, there was so much noise from military jets...There is no way i could tell if this craft was silent or not.

it was almost like there was some kind of chase/grid search going on.
content.summary: Similar to jet - but not identifiable.

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out to have a late night cigarette break in front of my home at approximately 2:15 a.M. after about 2 or 3 minutes, i happened to glance up in the sky just to look at the stars,when i noticed a very strange saucer shaped craft flying pretty low to the ground.It had a very unusual sequencing light on the front, which lit up from left to right.
it started as a blue color than gradually turned to red, and repeated.
it also made no sound whatsoever,i could also see what appeared to be a brightly lit window of some sort on the side of the craft emitting a yellowish light.After it flew over at such a slow speed, i knew if it was an airplane it would have fell out of the sky.Because it was at an almost stand still in the air.
about 5 minutes later i saw an identical craft which was also silent, following almost the same flight path. needless to say i was pretty shook up after seeing the second identical craft.I have never seen anything even remotely close to this in the sky, i lost sight of the object after a couple minutes as it glided out of sight over my home.
content.summary: Looking up into the sky at roughly 2:15 a.M. i noticed a disc shaped object with a  sequencing blue to red light flashing across the front of the craft. also it was traveling at a speed so slow that an airplane would have fell to the ground. made no sound

content.detailedDescription: I'm a meteorologist so i frequently step outside to check the sky conditions - while doing so - i saw a bright white light roughly twice the size of the background stars behind it. it was traveling at the speed of a jet aircraft at high altitude (as witnessed from the ground) from northwest to southeast. at first i thought it was a plane - but it had no navigation lights and made no sound i could hear. the sky was clear and i had a good view of the object. it moved accross the sky away from me for aprox. 2 1/2 minutes - then turned red - and dissapeared as if it had simply blinked out of existance. i felt dissapointed that i didn't have an opportunity to see it in more detail.
content.summary: White light traversing the sky - dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was getting the kids loaded up to go pick the wife up from work, when i looked at the sky....The first clear sky in days so when i looked up i seen a few lights shooting across the sky and aftr the last one went by i noticed a very dim one way up there and i just got chills after that i noticed that the light almost disappeared when i jumped a quarter of the way across the sky and did this all the way till it was right above to when all of a sudden it was instantly like a couple miles above town and no sound what so ever and then it was gone....Bam just like that, and i rean the house and jumped online to the satilite tracker and the only two above my area were 2 hrs prior to this event and ive seen this same ufo in kalispell montana as well almost identicl circumstances so ya dont know what else to say other than it was the coolest dam thing ive ever seen and there have been many sightings in this area above the fort peck soiux reservation just nobody reports anything, and i was so dumbfoundd i never even thought to go get the camera i was just froze in awe but ya hope to get another for y
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Kinda like a trapezoid no lights but a few and made no sound whatsoever.

content.detailedDescription: This photo is from a friend of mine. she said it had a strange formation and i perceived it to look like a flying saucer. it's not an actual flying saucer but the clouds take the form of one that looks awfully like a ufo. if you're wondering if it is photo-edited, it's not. just a coincidence i suppose that the clouds took that shape that time of day. it must be a sign of some sort.
content.summary: The clouds are in the formation of a flying saucer.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend walked outside with her dog at around 9pm. as soon as she got outside she called to me about a large white light flying across the sky. i have told her of several experiences i have had from my own yard before so she has since been paying extra attention to the sky. i jumped up immediately and stuck my head out side to see a large, bright white light (circular or orb shaped) traveling east, towards lake michigan. i knew that it was not a craft civilians are aware of due to to the lack of any faa lights, it's size and intensity.  i jumped back inside to grab my binoculars which are literally 3 feet inside my door. it took no longer than three seconds and within that time, whatever it was completely disappeared. my girlfriend described how it disappeared as fading out. the night sky was oddly clear. we have light pollution issues normally but visibility tonight was exceptional. the whole sighting lasted no more than 15 seconds leaving us no time to take video or pictures.
content.summary: Bright white light steadily travelling east, literally disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Not the first time i have seen this astonishing and amazing site.  i was walking my dog and happened to glance up.  i noticed a large venus size and shape orb...That was beneath the clouds.  it was moving slowly eastward.  suddenly..It abruptly turned south and then went straight up to star level and faded away within 2 seconds.  i estimate it went from in our atmosphere to outside our atmosphere in 2 seconds.  in other words...It went 80,000 to 120,000 feet in 2 seconds...Without one sound.  no emissions...No chemical trails.  

i have lived near o'hare airport my entire life and know full well what a plane looks like.  this was not a plane.  it was under the clouds, and it changed directions...So it was not a satellite, either.  if people would look up to the skies every now and then between 9:00 pm to 11:00 pm in the midwest...I am sure you will see it...And you will agree...It is not from earth.  i highly doubt the military would be testing anything with that extreme speed right near the highly populated suburbs of chicago.  i have seen this blue-white orb moving along before...Even closer than tonight...And i am now convinced that it is not only under intelligent control, but i am convinced that whatever it is that i was lucky enough to see again...Is definitely not from earth.  nothing we have could have chased that thing down.  

i wonder if radar caught it, but i have no idea...And i probably will never know if someone is/was tracking this thing.  i posted this to share information, but also in hopes that by some freak chance...Someone around here looked up into the sky at the same spot i did...And saw the same thing.  again...That would not be the first time for that, either.  other people in illinois have reported this same thing...To this very site.  why did i get to see it?  my answer is because i tend to look up at the sky more than most people do.  look up between 9:00 pm and 11:00 pm and you just might see it, but good luck sleeping after.  you will be up half the night wondering what you just witnessed.  if i had my video camera with me...It would be so hard to zoom in and get a good shot of it...But i will keep trying.  it was too quick to get the angle on it...Even if i had a camera.  be on the lookout in the midwest...Blue white orb.  looks like venus but it is moving.
content.summary: White orb at close range...Turns south and then straight up.

content.detailedDescription:
I was 16.. now i am 27, so its a long time ago, but i still remember this experience.

me and my friend were riding a moped to get to our soccer training in neubrandenburg. it was the b104 between the villages "pragsdorf" and "sponholz" in germany.

on circa 2 o'clock (not time but direction) we saw a light - maybe comparable with a star in the sky at night. but this light was in move. there is a small military airport in this direction. it seems as it started from that point, but it was too far away to be sure.

so the light upraised very very fast... impossible that this could do a helicopter or anything like that. next, it stopped and was inactive for about 2 seconds. than it moves very very fast in the same direction we were riding to and up in the sky. this move lasted about 1 to 2 seconds. in this time no known airplane could move so quickly that it is out of range for our eyes.

while the ride and again after it, i asked my friend "have you seen that thing too?". i know that he said yes, but i don't remember the rest of the conversation.
content.summary: A white light upraised very fast, and disappeared very fast to the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
looking at the sky, watching the fireworks.

2. what made you first notice the object?
became distracted from the fireworks when a large light moving northward appeared. 

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
it looked like a shooting star.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions.
the single light transitioned into a series of little lights shaped in a crescent with an orange light in the middle that flickered at times.

the object moved eastward, behind the house, low in the sky. when it turned around the house, the series of small lights were no longer seen, but rather, the object took shape as a finned or winged, cigar-shape with a square tail. the rounded-tip fins/wings almost looked see-through and out of proportion (too small and swept back), relative to the size of the subject object.

the object continued to travel very slowly and low and somewhat tilted.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. 

it was foreboding: it didn't make a sound, which was most curious.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?

it proceeded westward out of sight.
content.summary: Unidentified object seen over dearborn, michigan 7/3/10 pm.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside for a cigarette and seen a very bright flash of light above my head.  when i looked up i expected to see a firefly as they are common this time of night/year.  instead i seen a very dim point of light almost unviewable traveling from south to north that within a minute traveled through the little dipper.  the object appeared to be in the outer atmosphere.  while viewing this point of light it flashed very brightly every few seconds (approximately 5 to 7 seconds).  it flashed very brightly 2 or 3 times before it apparently quit flashing.  it was at this time i lost sight of it.  the object would not have been noticed if it did not flash.  there were no other witnesses, photos.
content.summary: Very bright intermitent flashes of light.

content.detailedDescription:
From 1997 to 2000 i was sationed at edwards afb and had multiple experiences at the base i would like to pass on to someone. many i cannot explain or understand. i need to remain completely anonymous and do not want to make any formal statement about anything but would like to discuss information with someone. 

i was assigned to many bases over my 10yrs including

loring afb, me
whiteman afb, mo
edwards afb, ca

with deployments to 13 countries and other short tdy's within the us.  i worked as an aerospace ground equipment technician during these 10yrs.
content.summary: Multiple events.

content.detailedDescription:
July 7th 2010, 10:00pm 
walking down a street in western seattle, i looked to the sky and saw a large bright gold object crossing the sky from east to west. i watched it because it was unusually large and near to the earth. the object suddenly began to fade away at a rapid speed and then turned red and disappeared altogether. later that night, i saw four or five other bright objects zoom through the sky at an insane amount of speed. some of the objects would disappear and then reappear and others would turn from gold to gray. at about 3:00am on the 8th of july i saw a brilliant light that appeared to be a golden magnetic energy rise from the earth until about two hundred feet off the ground at which point it stopped emitting the gold light and began to blink in a manner very similar to a commercial jet. the object then blinked a pattern of red, green and blue lights, turned in my direction and then flew over my head. i was unable to discern its shape. it then flew away and as the distance between it and me increased, the blinking lights made the object look like a shimmering star. but if you scrutinized it closely, you could tell it wasn���t a star, but some form of advanced technological cloaking device. then i noticed there were other ���stars��� in the sky that blinked in a similar fashion. as i watched these objects, some of them moved slowly through the sky, while others zoomed at very high speeds. then they objects would settle down again and mimic the stars. 
july 8th 2010, dusk.
due to the prior night���s events, i found a good viewing spot (the top of a hill in wedgewood) and began watching the sky much earlier. from this vantage point i witnessed hundreds of these ���stars��� crept across the firmament and descended ever so slowly from the real stars to earth. they moved so slowly that if i hadn���t been anticipating the event and patiently watching, i never would have noticed. but i did notice. and as the ships reached earth the sun went down. but just before it was totally dark, i caught a brief glimpse of one of these ships. to my surprise it resembled a very sophisticated space-plane. it hummed soothingly. the other ships then came in my direction traveling slow and low, but keeping their lights in a fashion as to mimic commercial jets. occasionally the light pattern would change into a sudden brilliant display of undulating red, green, blue and gold lights. the ships then circled around seattle for an hour or so, at which point some of them scattered out in all directions, while others settled in the sky and mimicked the stars. i stayed up all night watching the ships that remained. some had three lights and appeared to be triangular; others had four lights and appeared to be square. i got some footage with my cell phone. but the quality is pretty low. also, they knew when i was about to take a picture because almost every time i raised my camera, they would change from what they were doing with the lights back to a commercial jet pattern. i talked out loud and it was as if they could hear me. for a while nothing particularly obviously out of this world happened. so i said, ���okay, i���ll but my camera away.��� then the ship nearest me did a good deal of rapid blinking and all of a sudden, to the south, i saw a golden light arise over capitol hill. it neared me. when it flew past, i saw that it was another ship that had just come in. then i walked home and went to bed.
content.summary: When a ufo mimics a star from afar and then descends to earth from the firmament  very, very slowly, almost nobody notices.

content.detailedDescription: Was stopped at a stop light, when i looked up i saw an orb shaped object that was as bright as the sun but significantly smaller. within seconds the object disappeared into the sky.
content.summary: Orb shaped sun like object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going southbound on hwy 680 in the dusk hours, but while there was still plenty of day light.  this was a daylight sighing.  although it was years ago, i remember it very vividly.  there were three very large oblong shaped aircraft hovering over the freeway and a little east of the freeway.  i was driving a car, and actually pulled over into the emergency lane, got our of my car and watched until they disappeared, which they did one at a time, the closest one being the last to disappear.  their departure was sudden and instantaneous, as if they vanished, but prior to their departure, they shot out what i can only refer to as "sections of light", about the size and shape of telephone poles, in rapid succession, towards the ground.  the craft were enormous.  there was no audible sound associated with this sighting.  many other cars were on the freeway.  i was the only one who stopped, but i know others saw them too.  

i am requesting a contact from you to let me know if you know of others who saw the same thing.

thank you.
content.summary: Three very large aircraft which hovered over hwy 680 at low altitude for approximately 30 seconds-1 minute.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to publix with my mom and dad, when all of a sudden 4 bright white lights aligned across the front of the first ufo and i turned in the direction it was going and looked up and u could see a triangle and it was completely silent. no blinking lights, all lights were solid. and it was hovering fast across until you couldnt see it anymore, and when i got to publix and parked and i look in the direction it came from  and there was another one, same exact thing hovering at the same speed and silent. same color lights. it went in the same direction the other one went. i was shaking when i saw it. u could easily tell it wasnt a plane, because unlike a plane it didnt make noise, didnt have any blinking lights. only solid bright lights. and they were flying low enough to tell it was not because of the atmosphere.
content.summary: I saw 2 football sized ufos.

content.detailedDescription: There was five of us sitting on my front porch stairs.. we were just talking enjoying the beautiful night, and the next thing you know , a bright reddish orange glow lit up the sky.It caught attention right away! our first reaction was " what is that?" it looked like a triangular shape of orange glow.So my friend took a picture of it with his camera phone, and when he zoomed in on it, it had an aero shape, and looked like fire.It slowly traveled across the sky in a straight line for about 2-3 minutes.. then we could no longer see it once it went through the clouds...
content.summary: Reddish orange glow, aero shaped, traveled slowly in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription: While looking through google maps, we discovered this in the sky. please see the attachments. they are screen shots i made of this distortion and strange object.
content.summary: Something strange found on google map street view up in sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were walking to the local walgreens. and as we were approaching our destination. we both noticed off in the distant sky a white cylindrical shaped object moving slowly to the southeast.We noticed it moving in an up and down manner and changing speeds sporadically as well as hovering at times. we also noticed it seemed to become opaque at times as well. we don't live to far from the tampa airport. and we are familiar with commonly seeing all types of aircraft. while this object was like something we have never witnessed before. i would like to find out if anyone else has reported this craft in the same area and time as i have. thanks *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: While walking down us hwy 19 in port richey, florida i looked in the distant sky. i observed what appeared to be a white cylindrical shaped object moving slowly in a southwesterly direction.

content.detailedDescription: Very strange bright light. lasted for several hours. looked like a worm hole.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in vietnam.
content.locationName: Ho Chi Minh City, Prey Nokor

content.detailedDescription: It was arond 3:45 a.M. on july 9,2010 i was sitting in simons playgrond in east germantown,pa. and just happened to glance up at the sky westward and noticed that one of the stars seemed to be pulsating. at first i thought that it might be venus or a satellite moving across the horizon towards the north when it started moving rapidly across the sky. i know it was not a airplane by the rate of speed and altitude when the object made a right angle turn downward and then another right angle turn south and never changed it's rate of speed. as the object got about halfway back across the sky where i initially noticed the object, the object turned upward in an arc like turn while it ascended to where the object appeared as a little point of light instead of the bright star i originally thought that it was. it pulsated 4 or 5 times and then descended as quickly as it ascended back down to about the level in the sky where it started from. at this point i'm losing it because this can't be happening and to make sure that i'm not crazy, i pulled out an l.E.D light i had in my pockect and started flashing it at the light and the light maved towards my direction and aligned itself with my position, this is when i noticed a second starlike object to the first objects left begin to move across the sky in a loop the loop type fashion  so i started flashing the l.E.D. at this object also and it seemed to respond by stopping, descending and pulsating in accordance with each flash from my light. to my astonishment the first objecttraversed the horizon in a triangular direction which as far as i know convetional aircraft can not do. i must have played this game of flash and pulsate until dawn. as the dawn approached both objects seemed to ascend and as they became small points of light in the sky they were joined by a third light. the morning sky became brighter and the the objects appeared to fade into sky. i found myself thinking that i must be losing my mind and why am i witnessing this by myself, nobody is going to believe this. i found myself wishing that whatever it was that i saw, if it is extraterrestrial and they were trying to communicate with me, why won't they come on down? i plan to be in the same place around the same time to see if i was just seeing things or was my mind playing tricks on me! this time i will bring my video camera to record anything that takes place. here's to hoping i'm not crazy.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I observed a starlike object speed across the horizon then make two right angle turns and returned  back across the horizon arcing as it ascended.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my aunt on a 2 hour ferry ride to okracoke island, nc and took some photos of our surroundings while out on open water.. i did not notice this "ufo" at the time, but when i went home and looked through the photos this caught my immediate attention. it is an oddly shaped, shiny metalic object high and far away in the sky.
content.summary: Caught on camera.

content.detailedDescription:
The 2010 independence day celebrations in my hometown took place on saturday july 3rd rather than on the traditional date of the 4th.  my home is situated where the fireworks are visible from my yard and i decided to snap some pictures of the displays.  i took a total of 23 shots between 9:46pm and 9:56pm (eastern) with most of them being from the same vantage point facing south.   many of the photos contain odd lights that are not firework embers, and i���ve attributed the lights to being as yet unexploded ordinances or stars and planets that were momentarily visible through smoke and cloud.  and some of the photos show ���orbs��� that i attribute to particles in the air near the camera lens (see photo #01 at 9:46).  but there are blue spheres that appear in various sizes, locations and light densities (meaning level of brightness) in a few photos that i cannot explain away.   they are quite bright and well defined in 2 of the photos. 

in photos #14 (9:49pm) & #17 (9:52pm), a blue sphere is visible that is fairly large, very distinct and surrounded by light.  enlargement of the anomalies shows a clearly 3-dimensional blue ball shaped object at the center.  the anomaly appears on the immediate left edge of the firework display in photo #14 and to the right of the display in photo #17.    this blue sphere does not appear in photos #15 (9:50) or #16 (9:51).  nor does it appear immediately after photo #17 in either #18 or #19 which were also shot at 9:52pm.  

camera used:  olympus camedia digital d-540z, 3.2 megapixel

during the entire 10 minutes in which i snapped pictures, i rarely looked at the scene via the naked eye. i primarily viewed the fireworks through the camera, so i did not see the blue spheres until the photos were viewed and downloaded into my computer.  perhaps they are just a trick of the camera, but i submit the photos for the viewer to decide.  

(ref previous case file 18088)
content.summary: Distinct blue spheres appear near firework displays.

content.detailedDescription:
These 4 bright lights had the appearance of a hockey stick.Unable to determine weather it was a solid object.This hockey stick(or possible triangular shape other wittiness believed they saw)

it was seen over the barneget bay looking west at about 35* in but unable to determine distance. for 3 nights it remained in the same area of sky then on the third night a smaller less bright light moved slowly to the main object.It really looked as if it was swallowed-up or perhaps entered the object....  

next the hockey stick of the four bright lights slowly faded and the object was gone....

a truly amazing sight.There must be others that observed this.I don't know if this is a sighting your origination considers a possible follow-up.

1.Sitting on my neighbors deck talking, gazing out over the night sky (incidentally i don't believe any witnesses were intoxicated)

2.We never  saw this formation of lights in the sky.What made it stand out from the rest of the sky was the fact they remained in one location.It was obvious due to the movement of stars etc.

3.Four very bright stars that we never saw in the night sky pryor to event.

4.The 4 bright lights remained in the same sky location,apparently hovering in a fixed position.

5.Feelings amazement and perhaps it could have been non-terrestrials

6.The lights faded out and it was goon.I want to add the weather conditions were clear and  cloudless .........


thank you....
content.summary: 4 very brights, stationary, 3 in a row, 4 light down at angle. pattern seen several nights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside of the car waiting for my wife to get off work.I saw what i thought was an airplane.The plane was traveling straight towards myself in the west direction.There is an airport some 10 miles away so i thought i was watching a plane.I notice the sound of the engine was not that of a normal aircraft.It had 3 ligths in a triangle pattern one green light in front and two red lights in the back.All three lights were flashing slowly.It got closer i noticed the sound saw the lights as it got directly above me it vanished along with the sound.I have been watching planes come and go while waiting for my wife and i have never seen a plane travel this route so low and in this direction.The feeling i got after i saw this was very shocked because i had never seen a plane suddenly shut off all lights and engine sound too.It baffled me.I have also seen lights that seem to keep their distance from me but also seem to follow me.I will drive to tampa and pick up my 2 sons and have a light some distance away from me but travel along with me like (it) thinks that i do not notice this thing off in the distance keeping up with me.It has done this to me more than a couple of times.It looks like a star but its way to bright be a star and star do not fly ahead of you about a couple of miles and sit there until you catch up and then take off another couple miles ahead and sit and wait for you.Well thats all for now.

thank you
content.summary: I saw what i thought was an airplane but.......

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my back patio deck with my wife my daughter and nephew at around 1010pm i seen the first object flying towards my house maby 25000 ft in hight ,through my binauculars the objects looked disc shaped which my nephew also confirmed their was no noise at all and i have to mention commercial planes fly over alought so i know the differance plus these objects were one solid color the second object got really bright several times i scan the sky's every chance i get and i can tell you they deffinately were not any conventional planes the sightings lasted untill they went out of view about 2 minutes after they were out of sight three large planes flew over they sounded louder than the commercial planes do but with all the exitement i couldnt say for sure they were military but it certainly seemed weird that they would fly by right after these objects did they were travelling at a steady pace changed direction slightly to the right and headed in the direction of port morion if you were to draw a straight line, over the last four to five years i have seen several very interesting objects the very best were a kind a chevron shaped object which looked semi transparent almost like the colors were moving around constantly because you could see the night sky in between the color which was a pinkish red the left wing tilted downwards then it straightened out then the right wing tilted then it started to accelerate very quickly i reported that sighting to brian vike's web site if it's archived their the report would have more than i can remember now,another night when i got home from work around 11:15pm i went out for a smoke and while i was standing on the side of my house talking on the phone i commented on how dark and clear the night was to my friend who got me interested in ufo watching anyway when i turned my head to the left i seen a very bright amber orange light flying towards me so i ran in the house and went to the back patio where i watched this object fly by very slowly at first then it started to accelerate and climbed very quickly in altitude on what looked like at least a 65%incline until it went out of site those to sightings happened approximately 2 years ago that sighting was also sent to brian vike,so that's it their seems to be a fair amount of activity in this area and i thought it would be nice to share it thank you.
content.summary: 2 objects app 1 to 2 mins apart same direction followed by three large planes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside enjoying one of the rare evenings with low humidity and great starshine for a summer's night in florida.  viewing toward the east and scanning the constellations that were unusually bright for this time of year, i focused on scorpio to the south/southeast.  after a few seconds of viewing scorpio, i wondered if sagitarrius was above the horizon yet.  as i moved my view more to the southeast suddenly a large bright yellowish green circle appeared out of nowhere.   it was high in the sky and just east of scorpio trailing a short streak of silver-white plume moving straight northward with incredible speed.  and then disapeared just as suddenly.  the total viewing lasted approximately three seconds.

i orginally thought i had witnessed merely a common meteor.  but, after further thought, a meteor the size of this object would have left a much larger trail and made a brilliant flash of light upon disintergration.  if it were a meteor it's size alone would have lent it to trail completely across the sky.  and the object just vanished with no final event.  no flash, explosion or anything.  it just switched off and disappeared.  as an armchair astronomer this event consummed only about three degrees or so of the ecliptic.

note:  the attached image does not represent the actual sky chart background for here last night.  however, my drawing is as close to scale as i can get it.
content.summary: Somenthing entered our atmosphere and then disappeared.
